description: 100¥ is a community-driven memecoin inspired by CZ’s message about balance and mindfulness in crypto. The project promotes a calm, responsible approach to investing, valuing health, patience, and perspective over hype or greed. The name “100¥” reflects the idea of participation without excess, symbolizing small, mindful engagement in the crypto space. There is no promise of profit or roadmap; instead, 100¥ serves as a social experiment in creating a safe, transparent, and sustainable memecoin culture centered on positivity, simplicity, and long-term wellness in the community.
